  #Lyrics: With the best of friends

    playNote(66, beats=0.6)

    playNote(62, beats=0.5)

    playNote(62, beats=0.5)

    #Lyrics: the best of friends

    #Lyrics: any~WAY~~

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Kick
for i in range(0,16):
    moveTo(i*4)
    playNote(36, beats=0.5, velocity=40)

# Snare
for i in range(0,16):
    moveTo(i*4+2)
    playNote(38, beats=0.5, velocity=40)

# Hi-hat
for i in range(0,64):
    moveTo(i*0.5)
    playNote(42, beats=0.2, velocity=40)


# ---------------- 电子氛围 ----------------
# Tom fill （每4小节一次）
for i in range(0,4):
    moveTo(i*16 + 12)  # 每4小节最后一拍
    playNote(45, beats=0.3, velocity=35)
    playNote(47, beats=0.3, velocity=35)
    playNote(50, beats=0.3, velocity=35)

# Clap （切分节奏）
for i in range(0,32):
    moveTo(i*2+1)  # 每两拍偏移
    playNote(39, beats=0.2, velocity=45)  # Clap 音色

# 电子低音脉冲
for i in range(0,16):
    moveTo(i*4)  # 每小节第一拍
    playNote(35, beats=1, velocity=35)  # 深沉的低音鼓/电子脉冲


# ---------------- Sweep 上升效果 ----------------
# 用 pitch 渐升模拟电子 build-up
for i in range(0,16):
    moveTo(64 + i*0.25)     # 在最后几拍制造效果
    playNote(60+i, beats=0.25, velocity=30+(i*2))  # 从C4往上扫音

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
moveTo(0)
playNote(50, beats=4, velocity=55)   # 低音
moveTo(0)
playNote(62, beats=4, velocity=55)   # 中音
moveTo(0)
playNote(57, beats=4, velocity=55)   # 高音

# 中间隔 1 拍
rest(1)

# ---------- 第一段 第2遍 ----------
moveTo(5)   # 前一遍(4) + rest(1) = 5
playNote(50, beats=4, velocity=55)
moveTo(5)
playNote(62, beats=4, velocity=55)
moveTo(5)
playNote(57, beats=4, velocity=55)

# ---------- 第二段 ----------
moveTo(9)
playNote(66, beats=4, velocity=55)
moveTo(9)
playNote(59, beats=4, velocity=55)
moveTo(9)
playNote(71, beats=4, velocity=55)

# ---------- 第三段 ----------
moveTo(13)
playNote(66, beats=4, velocity=55)
moveTo(13)
playNote(62, beats=4, velocity=55)
moveTo(13)
playNote(55, beats=4, velocity=55)

# ---------- 第四段 ----------
moveTo(17)
playNote(50, beats=4, velocity=55)
moveTo(17)
playNote(62, beats=4, velocity=55)
moveTo(17)
playNote(57, beats=4, velocity=55)

# ---------- 第五段 ----------

playNote(66, beats=4, velocity=55)
moveTo(21)
playNote(59, beats=4, velocity=55)
moveTo(21)
playNote(71, beats=4, velocity=55)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Pop Bass 循环（C - G - Am - F）
for i in range(0, 4):
    moveTo(i*4)
    
    if i == 0:  # C 和弦
        rest(2)   # 前奏空两拍
        playNote(36, 1, velocity=25)   # C2 根音
        playNote(43, 1, velocity=28)   # G2 五度
        playNote(36, 2, velocity=30)   # 回到 C2 长音衬底
        
    elif i == 1:  # G 和弦
        rest(2)
        playNote(43, 1, velocity=25)   # G2
        playNote(50, 1, velocity=28)   # D3
        playNote(43, 2, velocity=30)   # G2 长音
        
    elif i == 2:  # Am 和弦
        rest(2)
        playNote(45, 1, velocity=25)   # A2
        playNote(52, 1, velocity=28)   # E3
        playNote(45, 2, velocity=30)   # A2 长音
        
    elif i == 3:  # F 和弦
        rest(2)
        playNote(41, 1, velocity=25)   # F2
        playNote(48, 1, velocity=28)   # C3
        playNote(41, 2, velocity=30)   # F2 长音
